name: Iteris, Inc.
description: Iteris, Inc. is a leading technology company focused on providing intelligent transportation systems (ITS) and a variety of solutions for the transportation and agriculture industries. Founded in 1987, the company specializes in the development of advanced traffic management systems, weather information services, and smart transportation analytics. Iteris is dedicated to improving the efficiency and safety of transportation networks through innovative technologies and data-driven insights. The company's product offerings include traffic signal control systems, vehicle and pedestrian detection systems, and cloud-based analytics platforms that help municipalities and transportation agencies manage traffic flow and enhance road safety. Furthermore, Iteris has expanded its expertise into the agriculture sector, offering precision agriculture solutions that utilize data analytics to optimize farming practices and crop yields. With a strong commitment to sustainability and public safety, Iteris aims to shape the future of transportation through smart, data-informed decision-making and cutting-edge technology.
